org.fcrepo.kernel

Class Datastream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.jcr.api.JcrTools
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.FedoraResource
        • org.fcrepo.kernel.Datastream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fcrepo.jcr.FedoraJcrTypes

    public class Datastream
extends FedoraResource
implements org.fcrepo.jcr.FedoraJcrTypes
    Abstraction for a Fedora datastream backed by a JCR node.
    Author:
    ajs6f
